```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(narrator)
library(dplyr)
library(htmltools)
```

```{r}
narrative <- sales %>%
  group_by(Region, Product) %>%
  summarise(Sales = sum(Sales, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Sales)) %>%
  narrate_descriptive() %>%
  format_pct()

names(narrative) <- add_tag(names(narrative), "h2")

narrative %>%
  unlist() %>%
  paste("<br>") %>%
  HTML()

```
